name: MacSerbia Fluid
description: MacSerbia.org is a an official Serbian Macintosh User Group verified by Apple. The website and forum board have not been updated in a loooong time, this is a small fix for large desktop/laptop screens.

user.name: sirNemanjapro
user.about: Web developer from Serbia. Working mostly on local and NDA projects. I love simple and effective design.

additional_info:
Version info:
0.4 - Forum index look and feel fix.
0.3 - Forum index look and feel (boards, categories, forums, fonts, apple icon).
0.2 - Forum board category view look and feel (font style, size, padding, cell width).
0.1 - Basic forum index layout.
